summary:
============
DESCRIPTION
============
Adds a unigue greatswords to the game through the console or through forging (steel smithing and under daedric), mixed with frostmourne, dreadknight weapons and coolmanx\'s leviathen dagger.
descriptionHtml:
============
DESCRIPTION
============
Adds a unique greatsword to the game through the console or through forging (steel smithing and under daedric), mixed with frostmourne, dreadknight weapons and coolmanx\'s leviathen dagger. This is from my DAO/DA2 weapons at http://dragonage.nexusmods.com/mods/2872
and decided to import it over to skyrim.
I didnt \"create\" the models, all i did was piece them together.
Plan on adding the 1h sword later on when i have time.This is nowhere near perfect, took my awwhile with ALOT of messing around to get it working...ofcourse i would stumble onto a tutorial AFTER figuring it out the hard way.../facepalm
Not sure if it matters but the forging was set for the skyforge.

The sword has identical stats of the daedric greatsword
type help soulfrost in the console for the id#
=============
INSTALLATION
=============
Drop the files from the soulfrost folder into your data folder.
=========
Conflicts
=========
None that I\'m aware of.
==========
Credits
==========
Jojjo - For creating these awesome weapons and allowing me to use his work in my mod. http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=24850 and http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=17032
Coolmanx - For creating the awesome dagger collection and allowing me to use his work in my mod http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6836
author: trumpdog
